statements: DELETE FROM car_regulatory_requirements WHERE manufacturer = 'Toyota' AND manufacturing_year < 2010
DELETE FROM car_regulatory_requirements WHERE car_id = 101 AND manufacturer = 'Toyota'
DELETE FROM car_regulations WHERE car_id = 101 AND brand = 'Toyota';
DELETE FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant' AND last_inspection < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM car_safety WHERE safety_standard = 'Euro NCAP' AND car_id = 5;
DELETE FROM car_inspection WHERE car_id = 100 AND result = 'Passed';
